text: Music intro
Kerryann Dunlop was one of my first students at Fifthteen

a nail..you should be having a laugh but not too much of a laugh
.. oh don't start! She's really good on technique, the girl can cook. I'm using the rocking method Jamie taught me.
you just rock the knife backwards and forwards
Kerryann is going to be doing a really brilliant cookery course, she's a busy mum of
two kids.. she's on a really strict budget but she's still got the cooking skills
Fairy fingers! To make delicious food made with fresh ingredients that will
feed the family and make people
happy
imagine the saticfaction you'll have on your face
in your heart
when you put this down in front of your family and they eat it all
and if you've never ever cooked anything before
and you're nervous, she's the girl to hold your hand and walk you through that.
don't panic, I know you might be looking at this and think
oh no it's gone wrong, it's gone wrong.. it hasn't
this is what it supposed to be doing. She's going to tell you the simplest of things
and get you to absolutely understand why you're doing that or what techniques
you're going to use to achieve that. If you've never cooked before or you want a helping hand to cook some lovely
fresh delicious food then Kerryann is the one for you.
